content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 1812021 the supreme court made a decision on august 11 2021 awarding the plaintiff costs of 395992 eur which the defendant is responsible for paying the case has been appealed to the supreme court and further information about compensation is pending the court has made a judgment regarding several real estate properties dividing ownership between the plaintiff and the defendant as 60 and 40 respectively the supreme court has dismissed the application for revision the laws referenced in the legal decision are the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the court of second instance reviewed the case and agreed with the applicants appeal determining ownership of the shared property as 64 for the applicant and 36 for the defendant the court also ordered the defendant to reimburse the applicant for the costs of the appeal the defendant has requested the supreme court to review certain questions related to the case the supreme court will review the decision to ensure legal certainty and uniform application of the law the court of second instance disagreed with the previous rulings of the supreme court but the supreme court determined that the defendant had met the necessary requirements and dismissed the application for further review the court of first instance made a unanimous decision and referred to the previous ruling of the supreme court

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 181/2021, 11. 8. 2021
